page.description: Specify the default value for this field in new records. TIP: To enter an expression, enter a leading = sign. For example: =date(), =now() (today's date and time). You can use session variables as default values. For example: session.companyName. You can specify NULL to force the default new value to be blank. You can use Page Variables (i.e. the variables defined in the URL) by prefixing the variable name with 'PageVariable.' (e.g. PageVariable.lastname) NOTE: For numeric fields, numbers must be entered with a period for the decimal separator, regardless of the regional settings on the machine where the server is running.
